function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate data from IoT-powered assets due to sensor fouling, drift, lack of maintenance, or calibration","Impact":"Erroneous results leading to fallacious decisions in policy making","Mitigation":"Vigilant maintenance of sensors, equipment, and data quality verification using statistical techniques","Technologies":"IoT sensors, statistical data quality verification techniques","People":"Utilities, policy makers","Owner":"Utilities, policy makers"},{"Description":"Lack of standardised method for Covid-19 measurements","Impact":"Unreliable or inconsistent Covid-19 data influencing policy decisions","Mitigation":"Standardisation and accuracy of laboratory analytical techniques, international collaboration for standardisation","Technologies":"Laboratory analytical techniques, international collaboration networks","People":"Laboratories, public health authorities","Owner":"Laboratories, public health authorities"}]}
